The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership. "The crisis has been under way for three years," the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers. Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. "Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology," says Steve Ballmer . No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand. Reflecting its strategic importance, the debate over the use of cloud computing in financial services has moved up the agenda at this year's Sibos and has already been the subject of lively early Monday discussion with

Asked to sum up his relationship with Simon Cowell , the ex - Big Brother's Little Brother presenter stated: Well, Simon Cowell is Simon Cowell , a very busy man. I might have a meal with him, which is always entertaining because he is far more fun than most people give him credit for. Then I won't see him for six months. Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms, Steve Ballmer said. "That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners."
